ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: and( not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "API" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "Admin" ), text( SBU__c ) = "D&S", text( Account.Type ) <> "Distributor", or( and( End_User_Country__c <> "USA", Text( International_Code__c ) = "Domestic" ), and( End_User_Country__c = "USA", Text( International_Code__c ) <> "Domestic" ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The International Code is set incorrectly for this End User.
